bibl.title: Reconstructing the Landscape: Epigraphic Sources for the Christian Fayoum.

Christianity and Monasticism in the Fayoum Oasis. Essays from the 2004 International Symposium of the Saint Mark Foundation and the Saint Shenouda the Archimandrite Coptic Society in Honor of Martin Krause
bibl.author: VAN DER VLIET, Jacques

bibl.note: The epigraphic evidence in Greek, in Coptic, and to a minor degree in Arabic. - Funerary inscriptions. - Monumental dedicatory inscriptions. - Mural inscriptions. - Inscriptions on objets d'art. - Conclusion.
bibl.seg: VAN DER VLIET Jacques, Reconstructing the Landscape: Epigraphic Sources for the Christian Fayoum.

Gawdat GABRA (Ed.), Christianity and Monasticism in the Fayoum Oasis. Essays from the 2004 International Symposium of the Saint Mark Foundation and the Saint Shenouda the Archimandrite Coptic Society in Honor of Martin Krause (Cairo - New York, 2005) pp. 79-89.
